scanPackageClass

public static Collection<Class<?>> scanPackageClass(String packageName)
                                             throws CsvBangException
Scan all classloader in order to find all classes of the package

Parameters:
packageName - the package to find
Returns:
all classes of the package
Throws:
CsvBangException - if we cannot access to Jar files or resources
Since:
0.0.1

public static List<AnnotatedElement> getMembers(Class<?> clazz)
Get Members (fields and methods) of a class. Do not search members of parent class.
